channel.title: Creating ints?
channel.description: Okay so I took a model from Runescape's cache, gzipped it, put in my models folder, add models... and so on. I tried creating the ints for it but when I logged on it turned out very different. It was supposed to be the Lunar staff but I showed up as a gauge kinda thing. Could someone make the ints for me? [code] if(i == 9084) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 9084;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 9084;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Lunar staff";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A Moonclan staff.".getBytes();//examin info }[/code] This was my failed attempt to make a Lunar staff. Help please!

item.title: Creating ints?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Okay so I took a model from Runescape’s cache, gzipped it, put in my models folder, add models… and so on. I tried creating the ints for it but when I logged on it turned out very different. It was supposed to be the Lunar staff but I showed up as a gauge kinda thing. Could someone make the ints for me? if(i == 9084) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 9084;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 9084;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Lunar staff";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A Moonclan staff.".getBytes();//examin info } This was my failed attempt to make a Lunar staff. Help please!

Read full topic
